title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 12 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 12 2022
description:
Pro-abortion witness calls Senator Hawley transphobic for suggesting that only women can get pregnant. Joe Biden is too old for the job, Clay thinks he'll be forced to announce he's not running for reelection, Buck considers another steak dinner bet on it. LeBron James: If I were Brittney Griner I’d question going back to America. Is Elon Musk just trying to get Twitter at a discount?

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
